briefTitle: PRIMADOS Study:A Study of Avastin (Bevacizumab) Plus Docetaxel for First Line Treatment of Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
officialTitle: An Open Label Study of the Effect of First Line Combination Treatment With Avastin and Docetaxel on Disease Response in Patients With Metastatic Breast Cancer
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Response rate, median progression free survival, overall survival
